name: Santa's Little sh*ts
description:
You play one of 4 devils working for Krampus trying to steal Santas gifts before christmas.

The game can be played by 4 players, you must hit the two keys alternatively to move closer towards Santas gifts, but don't let him see you moving or you'll be sent back to the start. Steal as many presents as you can in 90 seconds to win.

Controls:
Player 1  - A & S
Player 2 - J & K
Player 3 - Left & Right
Player 4  - 4 & 5 (Numpad)
